revised_title: Discovery of Two New Chlorine and Carbon Compounds and a Compound of Iodine, Carbon, and Hydrogen
tldr: In this article, Mr. Faraday describes his discovery of two new compounds of chlorine and carbon, as well as a compound of iodine, carbon, and hydrogen. He explains the process of creating these compounds and provides evidence of their nature. These discoveries expanded the understanding of chemical reactions and the formation of new substances.
